data.message: Hey idiot, just on a sales perspective, you should have kept your pie hole shut, or just put it on your album like you did the rest, then maybe you wouldn't have offended so many (old long fans) so now you get a looser card.

replies.message: And who are you compared to him?
Someone who has been listening to him for 20 years since you where born, bet this is the first album you are old enough to buy Similac breath
Loser*. Keep your fucking mouth shut. It’s funny when someone tries to come back at a kid (it’s even in your “insult”), and the kid has better has grammar. 😂😂😂
Jake Weber so now you’re the grammar police, nothing more original, goes for you also Similac breath

well since I just happened to find this because someone else liked my comment to you and you’re too ignorant to tag me to talk shit, I too have listened to Eminem 20+ plus years. Problem is you’re 20+ years older than the kid you’re messing with and he sounds more intelligent than you. So carry on with the same joke.  Let’s see how many times you can repeat it.
Oh, and, learn, how, commas, work, William Shatner is getting pissed. 🤣🤣🤣

Eric Lange Then ask yourself this, he's still got a ton of fans and you leaving is what? Gonna affect him? Here's an idea, before calling him idiot, take a good wide glimpse at yourself on a mirror and watch it break.
Lol your dumbass profile pic says everything we need to know about you. Go smash a keurig in support of pedophilia.

James Kessler 😂your not supposed to drink the bong water fag, and if your talking pedophilia , that’s a libtard thing ❄️ and since you support kneeling which your probably good at in the rest stop bathroom, have a rainbow of a day👏👏
Dude I don't think he cares. He said he doesn't want 45 supporters supporting him. He said you can't be a fan of his respecting the orange bafoon 😂😂

Toria Clay actually who really cares either way, the actual point was why from a entertaining perspective, why would you disrespect any of your fan base, they don’t get my money either way so it doesn’t matter to me, not like he didn’t talk shit about Clinton, bush and obummer, it’s all for show nothing else.

Eric Lange you’re actually the only idiot here. Talking about sales perspectives? The man is one of the wealthiest musicians in the world, at this point he doesn’t give a fuck about making money. He used his platform to stand up for something he believed in regardless of how many pissy racist LOSERS he would upset.

Sean LaPorte typical liberal, racist wasn’t in any of the discussion and you took it there, even funny that m is white, he may be worth around 200 mill but doesn’t even make the top 10, dre is  number 3 madonna being#1, and hate to tell you but it’s all about the money, you being a artist looking for a break, when you get it are you going to sabotage your income by expressing you political stance or would you rather shut up and let it be about the music, and I never said I’m going to stop listening, I already own every album since I have listened for about 30 years.
